text: ane dhongi'one pana jani la'i'e, jemane kahevamam avyum ke allahana margamam jehada karo, athava inkari'one dura karo, to te'o kaheva lagya ke jo ame yudhdha karavanum janata hota to jarura satha apata, te'o te divase imana karata inkarathi vadhare najika hata, potana modha'othi te vato kahe che je te'ona hrdayomam nathi ane allaha ta'ala khuba ja jane che jene te'o chupave che
